1001001100001111 1111111111111111 11001100 ZZZZZZZZ 1 0  ;PUSH R16

1110111110111111 ---------------- -------- ZZZZZZZZ 1 1  ;LDI R27, 0xFF

1001001000001101 1111111111101110 11011100 ZZZZZZZZ 1 0  ;ST X+, R0
1001001000001101 1111111111101111 11011100 ZZZZZZZZ 1 0  ;ST X+, R0

1110110011101100 ---------------- -------- ZZZZZZZZ 1 1  ;LDI R30, 0xCC

1001001000000001 1101110111001100 11011100 ZZZZZZZZ 1 0  ;ST Z+, R0
